entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story who is fighting against a Death Eater. He launched himself across the floor and grabbed the Death Eater around the knees, causing him to topple.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: A person who helps Harry in fighting against the Death Eater. He overturned his desk in anxiety and pointed his wand wildly at the struggling pair, shouting 'EXPELLIARMUS!'

entities.name: death eater
entities.description: An enemy of Harry who is being fought against by him. He was grabbed around the knees by Harry and his aim went awry.

relationships.description: Harry is fighting against the Death Eater, as evident from the text where Harry launched himself across the floor and grabbed the Death Eater around the knees.
Neville is helping Harry in fighting against the Death Eater, as evident from the text where Neville overturned his desk and pointed his wand wildly at the struggling pair.
Harry and Neville are working together to fight against the Death Eater, as evident from the text where Harry flung himself sideways as Neville took aim again.
